title: shopart
author: shopart
content: I was wondering if you have a place here where I could offer something that may be of interest to your Bitcoin users. I have a unique domain name I own that currently is not being used to its full potential and am possibly looking to sell it or collaborate with someone who may be up for a collaboration? I hope this is okay posting this message here as I am not trying to spam at all, completely the opposite?Thanks Gary

comments.author: decodx
comments.body: Quote from: shopart on May 21, 2023, 09:17:25 PMI hope this is okay posting this message here as I am not trying to spam at all, completely the opposite?If you want to sell something, just make sure to post it in the Marketplace section. Since domain names are digital goods, you can place your ad under: Economy > Marketplace > Goods > Digital goods.

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: shopart on May 21, 2023, 09:17:25 PMI have a unique domain name I own that currently is not being used to its full potential and am possibly looking to sell it or collaborate with someone who may be up for a collaboration? Why don't you write your entire domain here and its history? Domain is very important for every business, but it doesn't have to be crucial. However, most often one first has an idea about the business, and only then does one look for an adequate domain.If you would give more details about it, you will probably get some useful tips, and instructions on what the possibilities are and what to do next with it.It is also very important what your interests are, so logically the website or service you start should be oriented towards that topic. Sincerely, I believe that a unique domain is not enough for someone to enter into business with an unknown person. The initial capital in that case cost only a few tens of dollars in the most expensive case and that is not an unaffordable amount for anyone with an idea.

comments.author: yhiaali3
comments.body: I remember there was a similar topic where one of the members wrote that he owns an old domain that contains the name BTC and is trying to benefit from it. I advised him at the time to display old things related to Bitcoin (an auction can be made to buy and sell all old things related to Bitcoin).Perhaps you can benefit from this idea and develop the site in this direction, especially since there is a lot of hype these days about (BRC-20 tokens) and Ordinals NFT on the Bitcoin blockchain after the recent upgrade.

comments.author: bettercrypto
comments.body: Quote from: shopart on May 21, 2023, 09:17:25 PMI was wondering if you have a place here where I could offer something that may be of interest to your Bitcoin users. I have a unique domain name I own that currently is not being used to its full potential and am possibly looking to sell it or collaborate with someone who may be up for a collaboration? I hope this is okay posting this message here as I am not trying to spam at all, completely the opposite?Thanks GaryThat means you are looking for a buyer for that domain that you want to sell, you can do that here. However, it is better to move the topic you made here to the correct thread section so that you can easily get what you want.Apart from that, also put the full details of the domain that you are selling so that if anyone inquires, they will only ask you a few questions.

comments.author: nioctib_100
comments.body: I wish there was a website for selling and buying Bitcoin-related businesses and gigs. Someone should build and launch that - I have a couple domains I purchased years ago that I would list. Something like Acquire.com, I sold a small ecommerce store I built a few years ago on there and have been a huge fan of their business model ever since. It would be relatively easy and (probably relatively successful) for someone to just copy that idea and brand it for Crypto-focused businesses and ventures.

comments.author: arwin100
comments.body: Quote from: shopart on May 21, 2023, 09:17:25 PMI was wondering if you have a place here where I could offer something that may be of interest to your Bitcoin users. I have a unique domain name I own that currently is not being used to its full potential and am possibly looking to sell it or collaborate with someone who may be up for a collaboration? I hope this is okay posting this message here as I am not trying to spam at all, completely the opposite?Thanks GaryIts ok to post something here especially if you offer a opportunity some forum users, but make sure that you post a detailed thread so that we can get a clear insights about what you are trying to offer. Since most of people offer and tell that they will discuss it via pm are scammers. To avoid getting an impression like this much better to create a post which people can easily got your intention so that they can think about trying about or totally ignore the offer.

comments.author: SamReomo
comments.body: Quote from: shopart on May 21, 2023, 09:17:25 PMI was wondering if you have a place here where I could offer something that may be of interest to your Bitcoin users. I have a unique domain name I own that currently is not being used to its full potential and am possibly looking to sell it or collaborate with someone who may be up for a collaboration? I hope this is okay posting this message here as I am not trying to spam at all, completely the opposite?Thanks GaryYou have came to the right place my friend. There are many such people on the forum who would like to purchase good domain names. If your domain name is truly good and it serves the purpose well then you will definitely find someone who will purchase it from you. But, in order to reach those users who are interested in purchasing such digital goods you should follow the instructions of decodx and go-to the proper board for finding the interested buyers.In order to get buyers you'll have to create a new post at the appropriate board. In that post you should write complete details about your domain name and also mention the niche of your domain name. There are many people who will find your post and send you offers either on the post or on your inbox. But, to keep things safe you should choose a good member of the forum who would work as an escrow for the deal. That way you'll be safe and you might get good amount for the your domain name.You should also keep in mind if you are really finding someone for collaboration then you must share full details of the domain and the way it could be helpful to generate good revenue for both parties. You can also find good writers in the forum who may write good content for your website within your budget range. Now, it's your choice either to sell the domain, or to find someone for collaboration or to hire good writers who can create good content for your site. Best of luck from my side!

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: I do not advise you to cooperate, especially since we are in a multi-country forum, mostly payment will be in Bitcoin or any non-reversible currency. If you think that the domain name is unique and worthy, then create an auction[1] offer here, specify the lowest price and the purchase price now and listen to the offers, if you find many requests and people Are willing to cooperate, try to be with a reliable person, otherwise, sell to the highest price.Also, most projects are not profitable in the long term, sell now and invest in bitcoin, and so the profit will be double.[1] https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=73.0

comments.author: shopart
comments.body: Hi Everyone,Sorry for delay in getting back to you all, however I never thought this forum was going to be that active, had 8 of you chatting which is great, so will pop back in more often now I know!I will try to reply to you all personally once I figure out how to do that so for now just updating.For anyone who was interested the domain name is bitcoinmembers.com . I build the WordPress site a long time ago and not done much with it since but think it should have some interest or potential, well hopefully anyway?ThanksGary  :-)

comments.author: shopart
comments.body: Quote from: decodx on May 22, 2023, 12:13:52 AMQuote from: shopart on May 21, 2023, 09:17:25 PMI hope this is okay posting this message here as I am not trying to spam at all, completely the opposite?If you want to sell something, just make sure to post it in the Marketplace section. Since domain names are digital goods, you can place your ad under: Economy > Marketplace > Goods > Digital goods.Hi  decodx,Thanks for the advice and will give the Marketplace a shot as well, much appreciated!

comments.author: shopart
comments.body: Quote from: examplens on May 22, 2023, 09:22:04 AMQuote from: shopart on May 21, 2023, 09:17:25 PMI have a unique domain name I own that currently is not being used to its full potential and am possibly looking to sell it or collaborate with someone who may be up for a collaboration? Why don't you write your entire domain here and its history? Domain is very important for every business, but it doesn't have to be crucial. However, most often one first has an idea about the business, and only then does one look for an adequate domain.If you would give more details about it, you will probably get some useful tips, and instructions on what the possibilities are and what to do next with it.It is also very important what your interests are, so logically the website or service you start should be oriented towards that topic. Sincerely, I believe that a unique domain is not enough for someone to enter into business with an unknown person. The initial capital in that case cost only a few tens of dollars in the most expensive case and that is not an unaffordable amount for anyone with an idea.Hi examplens,Thanks for your reply and the domain name is bitcoinmembers.com .  I purchased it 10 years ago in 2013 and not done much with it other than build a basic WP website and post now and again some bitcoin news topics.I thought it was time to try to do something with it! I wish back then I had bought bitcoin but I didn't, so hoping it might be worth something to someone who has a lot of bitcoins lol!Anyway, feel free to get back to me if you want any more info?BestGary

You say try in an auction, is there one here on this forum or was you thinking to place it somewhere else in an auction? If so any pointers would also be helpful!The domain I have is bitcoinmembers.comThanksGary

comments.author: yhiaali3
comments.body: Quote from: shopart on May 25, 2023, 08:58:40 PMMuch appreciated for you reply and advice. You say try in an auction, is there one here on this forum or was you thinking to place it somewhere else in an auction? If so any pointers would also be helpful!The domain I have is bitcoinmembers.comMy suggestion is that you create an auction site with old things related to Bitcoin, it could be old Bitcoin wallet addresses, old domains, pictures containing old articles of Satoshi, or any other things related to Bitcoin.You can collect these things from this forum or from any other place on the Internet and then put them on your site and auction them, but if you want to put your domain in an auction, you can try in the auctions section of the forum here:https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=73.0

comments.author: shopart

If so any pointers would also be helpful!The domain I have is bitcoinmembers.comMy suggestion is that you create an auction site with old things related to Bitcoin, it could be old Bitcoin wallet addresses, old domains, pictures containing old articles of Satoshi, or any other things related to Bitcoin.You can collect these things from this forum or from any other place on the Internet and then put them on your site and auction them, but if you want to put your domain in an auction, you can try in the auctions section of the forum here:https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=73.0Hey yhiaali3,Much appreciated for your input/advice that I have taken up on and you can find the post here in the link below!https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5454072.0Thank You!G

It would be relatively easy and (probably relatively successful) for someone to just copy that idea and brand it for Crypto-focused businesses and ventures.Hi nioctib_100Thanks for your comment and sorry for delay in replying, however I totally agree with you and just taken a look at Acquire.com and will be checking out the site more when I get a chance but looks like a good idea and might give it a go myself for what I have to sell!I listed my product here if you want to take a look here  - https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5454072.0ThanksG

comments.author: crwth
comments.body: There's no problem offering possible business opportunities here. I think you have a great domain and it's great that you have manage to keep it. I'm just wondering why you didn't do anything about it aside from the WordPress site. I do hope that you are able to put it to use somehow. You can post it on other sites as well if you are just selling it.

comments.author: shopart
comments.body: Quote from: crwth on May 26, 2023, 04:25:42 PMThere's no problem offering possible business opportunities here. I think you have a great domain and it's great that you have manage to keep it. I'm just wondering why you didn't do anything about it aside from the WordPress site. I do hope that you are able to put it to use somehow. You can post it on other sites as well if you are just selling it.Hi crwthThanks for your message, its nice to know that someone else agrees that it was worth keeping. I'm not sure if I have the knowledge and mind set to take this domain and social media sites to the next level as I'm coming up to my retirement soon, so I think it needs a young active mind that can develop it in to something truly Worldwide amazing, for me to look back on!Your response was a warming one and I look forward to staying connected here with obviously a nice group of people to date!CheersG
